title: Bug 49536 - Incorrect response code when accessing a URL without deployed webapps
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance without any deployed webapps and accessing a URL, it returns a HTTP response code of 200 OK, but with no content instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat server

Expected behavior: The server should return a HTTP error 404 because there are no webapps deployed.

Actual behavior: The server returns a HTTP response code of 200 OK, but with no content.
